structure.unit: ARTICLE VIIA. MOTOR VEHICLE REPAIR ORDINANCE

law.catch_line: Repair work categories for specialty and master mechanic certifications for heavy-duty trucks; examination.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-161.29. Repair work categories for specialty and master mechanic certifications for heavy-duty trucks; examination.
Repair work categories for the certification of specialty or master mechanics for heavy-duty trucks are:
Engine repair, gasoline/diesel.
Drive trains.
Brakes and braking systems.
Suspension and steering systems.
Electrical systems.
All persons applying to the Director to obtain certification as a specialty heavy-duty truck mechanic shall have passed an examination in one (1) or more of the above repair work categories. A person applying for certification as a master heavy-duty truck mechanic shall have passed an examination in all of the above five (5) repair work categories.
